name: Light in the Darkness Dungeon
description:
A procedural dungeon crawler made for GGJ 2022.  Choose between dark and light powers as you travel deeper into the dungeon.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z Sword Attack
  • X - Ability 1
  • C - Ability 2
  • V - Ability 3

Created by ChuRoo64 and Dapper Duck Software
